name: Project Joost
description:
In this Thrust-style game you gotta maneuver a rocket ship through a cave.

It's so bad the fifth level is almost impossible, but I'm too hyped to fix it right now. (tho don't worry, levels other than 1 - 4 aren't really creative)

Controls: Left and right arrow to rotate, space to thrust.

Its not really finished nor good, I might improve it in the future.
